name: net-ball
effect: Used in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon. If the wild Pokémon is water- or bug-type, this ball has a catch rate of 3×. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 1×. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon. Success rate is 3× for water and bug Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.
